bands.label: Foundational
bands.strength: You communicate basic ideas when needed, especially in familiar or low-stakes situations.
bands.growth: This capability will grow by practicing clearer articulation of expectations and boundaries in varied contexts.

bands.label: Developing
bands.strength: You communicate clearly in most interactions and are generally understood by others.
bands.growth: Further growth comes from navigating difficult conversations with confidence and intent.

bands.label: Established
bands.strength: You express ideas, expectations, and boundaries with clarity and confidence.
bands.growth: You can deepen this capability by modeling effective communication for others.

bands.label: Foundational
bands.strength: You take responsibility when guided and follow through on defined tasks.
bands.growth: This capability will grow by proactively owning outcomes, even in ambiguous situations.

bands.label: Developing
bands.strength: You reliably take ownership of your decisions and their outcomes.
bands.growth: Growth lies in extending accountability beyond individual tasks to shared outcomes.

bands.label: Established
bands.strength: You consistently demonstrate ownership and responsibility, even under pressure.
bands.growth: Further growth involves enabling accountability within teams or systems.

bands.label: Foundational
bands.strength: You make decisions when sufficient guidance or structure is available.
bands.growth: This capability will mature by practicing independent judgment in less-defined situations.

bands.label: Developing
bands.strength: You make sound decisions in familiar contexts with reasonable confidence.
bands.growth: Growth comes from increasing comfort with uncertainty and incomplete information.

bands.label: Established
bands.strength: You consistently make thoughtful and timely decisions under ambiguity.
bands.growth: Further development lies in guiding others through complex decision-making.

bands.label: Foundational
bands.strength: You engage with learning opportunities when they are clearly presented.
bands.growth: This capability will grow by actively seeking feedback and new learning experiences.

bands.label: Developing
bands.strength: You adapt your approach based on feedback and new information.
bands.growth: Further growth comes from applying learning across unfamiliar or complex situations.

bands.label: Established
bands.strength: You learn quickly and continuously adapt your thinking and actions.
bands.growth: You can deepen this capability by fostering learning environments for others.

bands.label: Foundational
bands.strength: You are aware of emotional responses but may find them challenging under pressure.
bands.growth: This capability will develop by practicing self-regulation during stressful or uncertain moments.

bands.label: Developing
bands.strength: You generally manage emotions effectively in most situations.
bands.growth: Growth lies in maintaining composure during prolonged or high-stakes challenges.

bands.label: Established
bands.strength: You remain composed and balanced even in emotionally demanding contexts.
bands.growth: Further development involves supporting emotional stability in others.

bands.label: Foundational
bands.strength: You engage with problems as they arise, often focusing on immediate elements.
bands.growth: This capability will grow by consciously breaking problems into structured components.

bands.label: Developing
bands.strength: You organise problems into logical parts and identify key variables.
bands.growth: Further growth comes from applying structured thinking to unfamiliar or complex problems.

bands.label: Established
bands.strength: You consistently structure complex problems with clarity and intent.
bands.growth: You can deepen this capability by teaching structured problem-solving to others.

bands.label: Foundational
bands.strength: You consider information as presented, with limited analysis.
bands.growth: This capability will grow by questioning assumptions and evaluating alternatives.

bands.label: Developing
bands.strength: You analyse information and weigh multiple perspectives.
bands.growth: Further growth involves applying critical thinking in complex or ambiguous situations.

bands.label: Established
bands.strength: You consistently apply objective and reflective analysis to decisions and ideas.
bands.growth: You can extend this capability by mentoring others in analytical thinking.

bands.label: Foundational
bands.strength: You are beginning to engage with others but may still prefer clarity before participating in shared decision-making.
bands.growth: Building confidence in expressing perspectives and negotiating boundaries will help this capability mature.

bands.label: Developing
bands.strength: You collaborate effectively in familiar settings and contribute meaningfully to group outcomes.
bands.growth: This capability will grow by engaging more actively in complex or conflicting situations.

bands.label: Established
bands.strength: You navigate collaboration with clarity, confidence, and mutual respect.
bands.growth: Further growth lies in mentoring others and shaping collaborative environments.

bands.label: Foundational
bands.strength: You focus on individual components of a system.
bands.growth: This capability will grow by exploring how actions impact broader systems.

bands.label: Developing
bands.strength: You recognise interdependencies and patterns within systems.
bands.growth: Further growth involves anticipating second-order effects and long-term outcomes.

bands.label: Established
bands.strength: You consistently think in systems, anticipating interactions and downstream effects.
bands.growth: You can deepen this capability by designing or influencing complex systems.
